name: Squeeze me out!
description:
Have you ever dreamed about beeing a slime?! 

No....... ? 

Yeah, me neither.

But this little weirdo right here wants to break out of prison to stay like this forever!                                                                  

Sid needs YOUR help to get around the guards, turrets and other crazy obstacles to make his dream come true!

___________________________________________________

Credits:

Main Menu: ES Disarray - Autohacker

Sewer Level: ES -Dark fantasy studio- Kitch
